MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML6 postcode area  of Airdrie, affecting properties in Cromarty Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:45pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15am on 17th April 2021.
